They gain a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. They can't use their {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} to hide, but they can cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as usual. In addition, whenever a creature on this island kills an enemy, it gains a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and becomes enlarged, as per enlarge person spell, for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
60f77f7a-080c-4f1b-a8e4-41c6ccf1c21d: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Any creature here gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} if it is of chaotic neutral {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}. If its alignment matches chaotic neutral along one axis only, it gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls.
56712dd1-0b21-4183-a252-469ebd1e8f22: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Every creature on this island suffers a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. Every time it fails a Will saving throw it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}force damage{/g}. This effect can be removed by a dispel magic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
4868fc53-9fd1-476f-844d-4a31824eec76:
This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Negative energy permeates this island.
In areas where its presence is strongest, all healing done with positive energy is reduced by 50%. All healing done with negative energy on this island is increased by 50%.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of all Necromancy school {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} is increased by 1.
All undead and dhampirs gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and their maximum number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is increased by 2 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}HD{/g}. In addition, every time such a creature deals damage, it restores its lost hit points equal to the amount of 20% of the damage dealt.
60bea855-d2b4-48b9-8899-279b1a6bd754: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Some creatures on this island are under the hypnotic control of a mind dominator. If the mind dominator is killed, those creatures will be released and aid you in battle.
9de85979-406a-42c6-ad03-1ed40feaf9b3: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The air is infused with raw, unbridled magic. The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic descriptor is increased by 2. Whenever a creature casts an arcane spell, a tiny magic eater pseudodragon appears out of thin air next to the caster and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} them. Whenever the magic eater hits the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed save, the magic eater affects the target with an effect that reduces the caster level of all spells cast by the target. Multiple applications of this effect stack. This effect can be removed by a restoration spell.
6b30585b-376b-4715-85f9-91f121039d61:
This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The elements, tainted by the energies of the Abyss, rage on this island.
Roaring gale: all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} made against targets more than 30 feet away suffer a -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
Lightning strikes: periodically, a random creature on the island is struck by a lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}10d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} by half.
Whenever a creature on this island casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with electricity descriptor, that spell's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 2.
bdb6ecd0-1c78-4a88-9a4b-49b444051345: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. The laws of magic on this island are peculiar. Every time a creature casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g}, or activates a magic item, it must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} (the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed check, the spell is wasted, but another random spell is cast on the same target instead. If the caster is under the effect of the protection from chaos spell when the check is failed, the spell is cast normally, but the protection from chaos is dispelled.
8e0e4c17-b537-49e3-ac4d-fd1c2e0f4fe2: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. This island is plagued by intense heat. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with fire descriptor is increased by 2, and all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} on hit. In addition, creatures without immunity to fire (including temporary immunity granted by effects such as a protection from energy spell) take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} whenever they cast a spell, and all medium and heavy armor they are wearing is red-hot, dealing damage to them each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Finally, pools of lava can be found on the island — a creature that steps into them takes 20d6 fire damage (a successful DC 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces the damage by half).
9e4ef068-0484-44fb-8769-e280cd7ddfa2: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. This island is ravaged by cannibals and diseases. Every time a cannibal devours a corpse, they go into a rage similar to a barbarian's rage and gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/good. In addition, every time an infectious creature hits with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating) or become infected with disease.
8cb3a262-510b-4330-90dd-e26e9daca3f6: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Time flows much more quickly on this island. At the beginning of each combat, all creatures are affected by the equivalent of the haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. In addition, all creatures begin to age rapidly: at the beginning of each turn, each of them has its aging counter increased by 1. As they age, the creatures gain a stacking {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} and suffer a stacking {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}. The effects of the accelerated aging are lifted once the party leaves the island. They can also be removed with a greater restoration spell.
0d0d434f-a503-45ee-bf5e-2deafa98631c: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. Whenever a creature with at least 3 levels in an arcane or divine spellcasting class casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, it must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed save, the creature becomes confused and goes into a rage similar to a barbarian's rage for 1 minute. After the effect ends, the creature gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Will saves for 1 minute.
69e2f04d-e63e-42f4-b9f5-c3989553e424: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. You can find elemental pillars on it. Every time the creature takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from any source, it takes an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
68a24bcc-4fbb-4de8-9361-5a7115d990a7: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. You can find elemental pillars on it.
